<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cat's Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=1253) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You fail a Reflex saving throw.

</column>

---

You instinctively twist away from danger. You can reroll the triggering saving throw and use the better result.

<title level="2">Cat's Luck leads to...</title>
[Expanded Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=1259), [Lucky Break](/Feats.aspx?ID=2320), [Reliable Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=1269), [Sense for Trouble](/Feats.aspx?ID=2325), [Shared Luck (Catfolk)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1263)
name: Cat's Luck
